attributes.action: Prosecute The Trolls That Made The Group "Dead Baby Jokes"
attributes.additional_details: This Group On Facebook Is Extremely Disrespectful To Those That Have Lost A Dear Little Baby, Its Not Right That Facebook Policies Allow This Kind Of Page On Their Site For Millions Of People To See, It Has Hurt And Upset A Lot Of People And We Cannot Allow This To Carry On!!!!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for Facebook.
